english.segment1: A crown of thorns, a mockery of You, my God, of You, my King. You took my place, a place so bleak and cold
english.segment2: A crown of thorns, a symbol of a desperate deed, Your desperate love. Your kindness, Lord, resounds inside of me
english.segment3: (Chorus:). There will never be a crown so cruel. You wore it like a king, a king of fools. You will always be the only King of kings
english.segment4: A crown of thorns, a crown of hate. For all You had, for all You gave. The king of all would rather serve than reign
english.segment5: There will never be a crown so cruel. You wore it like a king, a king of fools. You will always be the only king of kings
english.segment6: Crowned with many crowns. You are, crowned with many crowns. Crowned with many crowns. You are, crowned with many crowns
english.segment7: A crown of thorns, a crown of death. Forsaken by both God and man. But You prevailed to live and reign again
english.segment8: (And I know that) there will never be a crown so cruel. You wore it like a king, a king of fools. You will always be the only king of kings. The only king of kings. The only king of kings
